src_original: viśeṣaḥ punarjñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇe 'pyanantarāyakṛtatvāt,  sthānāsthāne yāvadāsravakṣaya iti sarvatra praśnaṃ pṛṣṭasya praśnavyākaraṇavyāghātācca //
vaiśāradyaiḥ pariṣadi samyagātmanaḥ śāstṛtvamātmaparahitapratipannatvaṃ vyavasthāpayati /  codakāṃścābhisaṃbodhau yāvanmārge tīrthyān sahadharmeṇa nigṛhṇāti //
smṛtyupasthānairasaṃkliṣṭo gaṇaṃ parikarṣati,  śūśrūṣamāṇādiṣvanunayādisaṃkleśābhāvāt //  arakṣyairnirantaraṃ gaṇamavavadati samanuśāsti,  svadoṣāvirbhāvanā śaṃkayānurakṣyābhāvāt //
vāsanāsamudghātena niḥkleśaḥ kleśapratirūpāṃ ceṣṭāṃ na darśayati yathārhan bhikṣuḥ skhalitādikaṃ darśayati //
